ingredients.content: 120 g red onion, cut into quarters
1 dash liquid smoke seasoning (optional - see Tips)
565 g canned jackfruit in brine, rinsed and drained (approx. 300 g after draining - see Tips)

preparations.content: Place oil, onion and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then cook <b>5 min/120°C/speed 2<b>
Add tomato paste, vinegar, tamari, coconut sugar, salt, paprika, chilli powder, pepper and liquid smoke (optional) and cook <b>5 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix <b>5 sec//speed 4<b>. Serve as desired (see Tips).
